**Reasoning:**
- The task is to identify the specific line item and value of costs incurred to secure customer orders and to deliver the goods and services to customers.
- In financial statements, these are most commonly classified as "Selling Expenses" (sometimes "Sales and Marketing Expenses"), which are costs incurred to secure customer orders and deliver goods/services.
- From the income statement, the line item "Selling Expenses" has a value of 855800.20.
- This is the correct and specific value to report as per the instructions.
